rules.description: Post right control when return_or_enter is hold.
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift + right_shift at the same time
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Control + u = move left one word
Control + i = move right one word
left_control + o = move forward one character
left_control + y = move backward one character
left_control + left_shift + l = open curly brace
left_control + left_shift + semicolon = closed curly brace
left_command + right_command + l = open curly brace
left_command + right_command + semicolon = closed curly brace
fn + h = delete entire line behind cursor
